tika.dc.description: From forced trusteeships to hostile inter-union raids, american labor has been gripped by a devastating civil war. Steve Early argues that these polices grow from the strategy of labor management collaboration, and must be replaced with a return to rank and file initiative if the labor movement is ever to stem the tide of its long decline.
tika.dc.rights: First published by Haymarket Books in 2011. © 2011 Steve Early
